feedback.feedback: You still have a long way to go, but good effort. For the next stage, I want to see improvements in the way you handle edge cases and a more thorough treatment of the primary use cases. Do more user research! It only takes a short time with a few people to make large improvements.

This looks really great! I love how you considered all aspects of the process and conducted user interviews with your target demographic. I'm excited to see where this is going. A word of advice: pay more attention to the fine details like color and typography. Reach out to me with any questions :)

Great job! This is what I hoped to see at the end when I took you on as a mentee. You've achieved something worthy of your portfolio and the attention of recruiters. I look forward to seeing your future projects develop.
